hanzi-su-wiki:
閲

Значения

Проверять, инспектировать

Мнемоника

Глашатай 兑 в воротах 門 дома, инспектор.

Варианты

閱, 阅

rtega_mnemonic:
閱閱RS
阅阅		閲examine, review, inspection
  • RS. door 門 (appearance) where people read 兌/兑
  • door 門 where one examines the wares to buy with cash 兌/兑
heisig_constituent: review, gates, devil, horns, elder brother, teenager, mouth, human legs
heisig_story: Gates . . . devil. Keep the connotation of this key word distinct from those of inspection (Frame 1174), revise (Frame 362), and perusal (Frame 919).
koohiiStory1: A little devil at the gates of hell reviews your record to see if you´re evil enough to get in.
koohiiStory2: As I was reviewing for my exam at a quiet saloon, the devil popped out of nowhere and offered to make sure I pass. But I told him no way, since that´s cheating. Besides, I´m just reviewing things I already know. I won´t fail. But he kept insisting, so I kicked him and sent him crashing through the entrance gates.
jp_example_words: 閲覧(えつらん): inspection, reading
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: Put a guard at your gate to get a good inspection of your neighborhood going. The guard will stand there all day inspecting everything and then report it all back to you. You won't have to do any of the inspection yourself!
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Imagine the guard doing his inspection in front of the gate all day long. He should have a nice report for you once he's done.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: His inspection is complete, but it looks like he's used an etch (えつ) a sketch to record all the results. That's not really helpful. If you shake it all the inspection results will disappear!
WaniKani_Reading_Info: If you hire a guard to stand at your gate and conduct an inspection of your neighborhood, make sure you tell him not to use an etch a sketch!
Ru_Radicals: 儿 (ножки), 并, 口 (рот), 門 (ворота)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: your eight elder brothers (兑) are at the gate (門) for an inspection

閲覧(えつらん): inspection, reading

閲字的基本解释

閲
yuè
见“阅”。

閲字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yuè］
［《廣韻》弋雪切，入薛，以。］
“阅1”的繁体字。“閱1”的新字形。
(1)逐一点数。
(2)检阅。
(3)搜索。
(4)观看。
(5)阅读；阅览。
(6)镜子。
(7)经过；经历。
(8)功绩。
(9)指仕宦人家自序功状而树立在门外右边的柱子。后来亦称名门巨室为“閲”。
(10)出。
(11)容纳。
(12)汇总；汇合。
(13)通“穴”。
(14)通“鋭”。
(15)指锐气。
(16)通“脱”。损减。

閲字的康熙字典解释

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
閲字的起名意思

暂无。

read
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yuè］
["Guang Yun" Yi Xue cut, enter Xue, to. ]
The traditional characters of "读1". The new glyph of "read 1".
(1) Count one by one.
(2) Review.
(3) Search.
(4) Watch.
(5) Read; read.
(6) Mirror.
(7) After; experience.
(8) Merit.
(9) Refers to the pillars erected on the right outside the door by the officials. Later, it was also called "Yue".
(10) Out.
(11) To accommodate.
(12) Summary; Convergence.
(13) Through the "acupoint".
(14) Through "鋭".
(15) Refers to spirit.
(16) Through "off". Loss.

yuè
яп. вм. 阅
Radicals: 門, 兑  (gate, guard)
Meaning Mnemonic
Put a guard at your gate to get a good inspection of your neighborhood going. The guard will stand there all day inspecting everything and then report it all back to you. You won't have to do any of the inspection yourself!
Imagine the guard doing his inspection in front of the gate all day long. He should have a nice report for you once he's done.
Reading Mnemonic
His inspection is complete, but it looks like he's used an etch (えつ) a sketch to record all the results. That's not really helpful. If you shake it all the inspection results will disappear!
If you hire a guard to stand at your gate and conduct an inspection of your neighborhood, make sure you tell him not to use an etch a sketch!
